name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_COMPENSATOR
desc_rn: Reduces vertical recoil by venting muzzle gasses upwards, improving control at a cost to accuracy.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_RX01
desc_rn: Red dot sight with a bright aiming point and clear sight picture for rapid target acquisition and tracking.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_COMPENSATOR
desc_rn: Reduces vertical recoil by venting muzzle gasses upwards, improving control at a cost to accuracy.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_HEAVYBARREL
desc_rn: Free floating heavy barrel improves aimed fire accuracy and slightly decreases recoil, but decreases maneuverability.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_GHOSTRING
desc_rn: Replaces the standard iron sights with a set of rapid acquisition Improved Iron Sights for a clear sight picture.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_PKS07
desc_rn: 7x magnification Russian marksman daylight scope for engaging targets over long distances.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_PISTSILEN
desc_rn: Pistol silencer that increases stealth by hiding your muzzle report and position on the minimap. Reduces bullet velocity and increases bullet drop.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_MUZZLEBR
desc_rn: Reduces felt recoil, making the weapon more controllable in rapid fire.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_COMPENSATOR
desc_rn: Reduces vertical recoil by venting muzzle gasses upwards, improving control at a cost to accuracy.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_ACOG
desc_rn: Fixed-power 4x Advanced Combat Optic Gunsight for use in bright to low light at medium range.

name: BFH_ID_P_ANAME_FLSHIDER
desc_rn: Reduces or eliminates muzzle flash, making it easier to see the target and harder for enemies to observe the shot origin.

name: BFH_ID_P_NAME_EXTENDEDMAG
desc_rn: Magazine with additional rounds for less frequent reloading.  Adds a slight penalty to maneuverability.

desc_rn: Russian unmagnified holographic sight with excellent light gathering capabilities and a clear field of view.
